Bool.DoubleClickRegularDialogue.Tooltip: Requires a double click to progress through dialogue boxes
Bool.ConfirmSleepDialogue.Tooltip: Requires a double click to confirm going to sleep
Bool.ConfirmQuestionAnswer.Tooltip: Requires a double click to confirm an answer to a question
Bool.ConfirmShopDialogue.Tooltip: Requires a double click to confirm shop response options
Bool.ConfirmMinecart.Tooltip: Requires a double click to confirm where you want to go on the minecart
Bool.ConfirmMineLadder.Tooltip: Requires a double click to leave the mines
Bool.ConfirmEating.Tooltip: Requires a double click to confirm eating a food
Bool.ConfirmTV.Tooltip: Requires a double click to choose a TV channel
Bool.ConfirmPhone.Tooltip: Requires a double click to choose who to call on the telephone
